title: Slow cooker lamb and sweet potato curry
ingredients: ['225g lean lamb', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 clove of garlic, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', '1 1/2 tablespoon garam marsala spice mix', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', '100ml stock', '1/2 tin tomatoes or 200g chopped fresh tomatoes', '1 sweet potato, peeled and diced']
